verses.verse: The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah; <S%H3063><s%> Pharez, <S%H6557><s%> Hezron, <S%H2696><s%> and Carmi, <S%H3756><s%> and Hur, <S%H2354><s%> and Shobal. <S%H7732><s%>

And Reaiah <S%H7211><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shobal <S%H7732><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Jahath; <S%H3189><s%> and Jahath <S%H3189><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Ahumai, <S%H267><s%> and Lahad. <S%H3855><s%> These <S%H428><s%> are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Zorathites. <S%H6882><s%>

And these <S%H428><s%> were of the father <S%H1><s%> of Etam; <S%H5862><s%> Jezreel, <S%H3157><s%> and Ishma, <S%H3457><s%> and Idbash: <S%H3031><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of their sister <S%H269><s%> was Hazelelponi: <S%H6753><s%>

And Penuel <S%H6439><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Gedor, <S%H1446><s%> and Ezer <S%H5829><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Hushah. <S%H2364><s%> These <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hur, <S%H2354><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Ephratah, <S%H672><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Bethlehem. <S%H1035><s%>
And Ashur <S%H804><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Tekoa <S%H8620><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> wives, <S%H802><s%> Helah <S%H2458><s%> and Naarah. <S%H5292><s%>

And Naarah <S%H5292><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> him Ahuzam, <S%H275><s%> and Hepher, <S%H2660><s%> and Temeni, <S%H8488><s%> and Haahashtari. <S%H326><s%> These <S%H428><s%> were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Naarah. <S%H5292><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Helah <S%H2458><s%> were, Zereth, <S%H6889><s%> and Jezoar, <S%H3328><s%> and Ethnan. <S%H869><s%>
And Coz <S%H6976><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Anub, <S%H6036><s%> and Zobebah, <S%H6637><s%> and the families <S%H4940><s%> of Aharhel <S%H316><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Harum. <S%H2037><s%>

And Jabez <S%H3258><s%> was more honorable <S%H3513><s%> than his brothers: <S%H251><s%> and his mother <S%H517><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Jabez, <S%H3258><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> I bore <S%H3205><s%> him with sorrow. <S%H6090><s%>

And Jabez <S%H3258><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> on the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Oh <S%H518><s%> that you would bless <S%H1288><s%> me indeed, and enlarge <S%H7235><s%> my coast, <S%H1366><s%> and that your hand <S%H3027><s%> might be with me, and that you would keep <S%H6213><s%> me from evil, <S%H7451><s%> that it may not grieve <S%H6087><s%> me! And God <S%H430><s%> granted <S%H935><s%> him that which <S%H834><s%> he requested. <S%H7592><s%>
And Chelub <S%H3620><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Shuah <S%H7746><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Mehir, <S%H4243><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> was the father <S%H1><s%> of Eshton. <S%H850><s%>

And Eshton <S%H850><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Bethrapha, <S%H1051><s%> and Paseah, <S%H6454><s%> and Tehinnah <S%H8468><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Irnahash. <S%H5904><s%> These <S%H428><s%> are the men <S%H582><s%> of Rechah. <S%H7397><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kenaz; <S%H7073><s%> Othniel, <S%H6274><s%> and Seraiah: <S%H8304><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Othniel; <S%H6274><s%> Hathath. <S%H2867><s%>

And Meonothai <S%H4587><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Ophrah: <S%H6084><s%> and Seraiah <S%H8304><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Joab, <S%H3097><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Charashim; <S%H2798><s%> for they were craftsmen. <S%H2796><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh; <S%H3312><s%> Iru, <S%H5900><s%> Elah, <S%H425><s%> and Naam: <S%H5277><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Elah, <S%H425><s%> even Kenaz. <S%H7073><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jehaleleel; <S%H3094><s%> Ziph, <S%H2128><s%> and Ziphah, <S%H2129><s%> Tiria, <S%H8493><s%> and Asareel. <S%H840><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ezra <S%H5830><s%> were, Jether, <S%H3500><s%> and Mered, <S%H4778><s%> and Epher, <S%H6081><s%> and Jalon: <S%H3210><s%> and she bore <S%H2029><s%> Miriam, <S%H4813><s%> and Shammai, <S%H8048><s%> and Ishbah <S%H3431><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Eshtemoa. <S%H851><s%>

And his wife <S%H802><s%> Jehudijah <S%H3057><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> Jered <S%H3382><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Gedor, <S%H1446><s%> and Heber <S%H2268><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Socho, <S%H7755><s%> and Jekuthiel <S%H3354><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Zanoah. <S%H2182><s%> And these <S%H428><s%> are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bithiah <S%H1332><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Mered <S%H4778><s%> took. <S%H3947><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of his wife <S%H802><s%> Hodiah <S%H1940><s%> the sister <S%H269><s%> of Naham, <S%H5163><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Keilah <S%H7084><s%> the Garmite, <S%H1636><s%> and Eshtemoa <S%H851><s%> the Maachathite. <S%H4602><s%>

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shimon <S%H7889><s%> were, Amnon, <S%H550><s%> and Rinnah, <S%H7441><s%> Benhanan, <S%H1135><s%> and Tilon. <S%H8436><s%> And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ishi <S%H3469><s%> were, Zoheth, <S%H2105><s%> and Benzoheth. <S%H1132><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shelah <S%H7956><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> were, Er <S%H6147><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Lecah, <S%H3922><s%> and Laadah <S%H3935><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Mareshah, <S%H4762><s%> and the families <S%H4940><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of them that worked <S%H5656><s%> fine linen, <S%H948><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Ashbea, <S%H791><s%>

And Jokim, <S%H3137><s%> and the men <S%H582><s%> of Chozeba, <S%H3578><s%> and Joash, <S%H3101><s%> and Saraph, <S%H8315><s%> who <S%H834><s%> had the dominion <S%H1166><s%> in Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and Jashubilehem. <S%H3433><s%> And these are ancient <S%H6267><s%> things. <S%H1697><s%>

These <S%H1992><s%> were the potters, <S%H3335><s%> and those that dwelled <S%H3427><s%> among plants <S%H5194><s%> and hedges: <S%H1448><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> they dwelled <S%H3427><s%> with the king <S%H4428><s%> for his work. <S%H4399><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%> were, Nemuel, <S%H5241><s%> and Jamin, <S%H3226><s%> Jarib, <S%H3402><s%> Zerah, <S%H2226><s%> and Shaul: <S%H7586><s%>
Shallum <S%H7967><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Mibsam <S%H4017><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Mishma <S%H4927><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Mishma; <S%H4927><s%> Hamuel <S%H2536><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Zacchur <S%H2139><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Shimei <S%H8096><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>

And Shimei <S%H8096><s%> had sixteen <S%H8337><s%> <S%H6240><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> daughters: <S%H1323><s%> but his brothers <S%H251><s%> had not many <S%H7227><s%> children, <S%H1121><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> did all <S%H3605><s%> their family <S%H4940><s%> multiply, <S%H7235><s%> like to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>
And they dwelled <S%H3427><s%> at Beersheba, <S%H884><s%> and Moladah, <S%H4137><s%> and Hazarshual, <S%H2705><s%>
And at Bilhah, <S%H1090><s%> and at Ezem, <S%H6107><s%> and at Tolad, <S%H8434><s%>
And at Bethuel, <S%H1328><s%> and at Hormah, <S%H2767><s%> and at Ziklag, <S%H6860><s%>

And at Bethmarcaboth, <S%H1024><s%> and Hazarsusim, <S%H2702><s%> and at Bethbirei, <S%H1011><s%> and at Shaaraim. <S%H8189><s%> These <S%H428><s%> were their cities <S%H5892><s%> to the reign <S%H4427><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%>
And their villages <S%H2691><s%> were, Etam, <S%H5862><s%> and Ain, <S%H5871><s%> Rimmon, <S%H7417><s%> and Tochen, <S%H8507><s%> and Ashan, <S%H6228><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> cities: <S%H5892><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> their villages <S%H2691><s%> that were round <S%H5439><s%> about the same cities, <S%H5892><s%> to Baal. <S%H1168><s%> These <S%H2063><s%> were their habitations, <S%H4186><s%> and their genealogy. <S%H3188><s%>
And Meshobab, <S%H4877><s%> and Jamlech, <S%H3230><s%> and Joshah, <S%H3144><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amaziah, <S%H558><s%>
And Joel, <S%H3100><s%> and Jehu <S%H3058><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josibiah, <S%H3143><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Seraiah, <S%H8304><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Asiel, <S%H6221><s%>
And Elioenai, <S%H454><s%> and Jaakobah, <S%H3291><s%> and Jeshohaiah, <S%H3439><s%> and Asaiah, <S%H6222><s%> and Adiel, <S%H5717><s%> and Jesimiel, <S%H3450><s%> and Benaiah, <S%H1141><s%>

And Ziza <S%H2124><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shiphi, <S%H8230><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Allon, <S%H438><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jedaiah, <S%H3042><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shimri, <S%H8113><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shemaiah; <S%H8098><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> mentioned <S%H935><s%> by their names <S%H8034><s%> were princes <S%H5387><s%> in their families: <S%H4940><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%> increased <S%H6555><s%> greatly. <S%H7230><s%>

And they went <S%H3212><s%> to the entrance <S%H3996><s%> of Gedor, <S%H1446><s%> even to the east <S%H4217><s%> side <S%H4217><s%> of the valley, <S%H1516><s%> to seek <S%H1245><s%> pasture <S%H4829><s%> for their flocks. <S%H6629><s%>

And they found <S%H4672><s%> fat <S%H8082><s%> pasture <S%H4829><s%> and good, <S%H2896><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> was wide, <S%H7342><s%> <S%H3027><s%> and quiet, <S%H8252><s%> and peaceable; <S%H7961><s%> for they of Ham <S%H2526><s%> had dwelled <S%H3427><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> of old. <S%H6440><s%>

And these <S%H428><s%> written <S%H3789><s%> by name <S%H8034><s%> came <S%H935><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Hezekiah <S%H2396><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> their tents, <S%H168><s%> and the habitations <S%H4583><s%> that were found <S%H4672><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> and destroyed <S%H2763><s%> them utterly to this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in their rooms: <S%H8478><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> there was pasture <S%H4829><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> for their flocks. <S%H6629><s%>

And some of them, even of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men, <S%H582><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir, <S%H8165><s%> having for their captains <S%H7218><s%> Pelatiah, <S%H6410><s%> and Neariah, <S%H5294><s%> and Rephaiah, <S%H7509><s%> and Uzziel, <S%H5816><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ishi. <S%H3469><s%>

And they smote <S%H5221><s%> the rest <S%H7611><s%> of the Amalekites <S%H6003><s%> that were escaped, <S%H6413><s%> and dwelled <S%H3427><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>
